appName.description: The name of the extension, displayed in the web store.

appDesc.message: Shoot laser at things you want to remove from the internet
appDesc.description: The description of the extension, displayed in the web store.

catDesc.message: The laser cat is trying to conquer the world with laser.

frogDesc.message: The hungry frog eats whatever it can find with its long tounge.

alienDesc.message: The angry alien consumes websites with black holes.

dogDesc.message: The calm dog is okay with the events that are unfolding currently.

unicornDesc.message: The fabulous unicorn has a magical horn with magical powers.

dinoDesc.message: The extinct dino can feel something big is heading its way.

ninjaDesc.message: The secret ninja has spent many years perfecting its throw.

howToStepThreeCatDesc.message: Click on the page to shoot laser

howToStepThreeFrogDesc.message: Click on the page to eat things

howToStepThreeAlienDesc.message: Click on the page to dissolve it

howToStepThreeDogDesc.message: Click on the page to start fires

howToStepThreeUnicornDesc.message: Click on the page to fire the horn

howToStepThreeDinoDesc.message: Click on the page to cause mass destruction

howToStepThreeNinjaDesc.message: Click on the page to throw ninja stars

pointsDesc.message: Zap things on the website and earn points.

cannotActivate.message: Laser Cat cannot be activated right now. Please reload or go to another.

cannotActivateChromeManaged.message: Laser Cat cannot be activated on Chrome managed pages. Please go to another.

unexpectedError.message: Something unexpected happened (error_code: '$error$'). Please try again later or contact the developer of this chrome extension.

notEnoughPoints.message: You don't have enough points to buy this character.

unlockStepTwoDesc.message: Support my work with a small donation and receive an exclusive secret code as a token of appreciation

unlockStepThreeDesc.message: Enter the code you receive from the email and click 'Unlock all characters'

wrongCode.message: The code you entered is wrong. Please try again!

unlockedName.message: You now have access to all characters!

unlockedDesc.message: Thank you so much for supporting me, it really means a lot ♥ I hope you will enjoy Laser Cat.

howToUnlock.message: This is how you unlock all characters.

rewardName.message: Thanks for sticking with my extension! ♥

rewardDesc.message: As a little treat for sticking with my extension, here is a brand new character for free! If you enjoy Laser Cat please rate it on the Chrome store.

onboardingLink.message: See how to use Laser Cat
